document.full_text: as its original partners leave, the elite at goldman sachs hold less control over the firm, giving way to the demands of outside shareholders. and the partners' power base may soon erode further.
document.title: a once-tight flock at goldman, now scattered
lines_and_colors: as its original partners leave, the elite at goldman sachs hold less control over the firm, giving way to the demands of outside shareholders. and the partners' power base may soon erode further.
